recipe.title: Citrus Dressing
ingredients: 1/4 cup frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
instructions: Combine vinegar, orange juice concentrate, parsley, lemon peel and orange peel in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. (Dressing can be prepared up to 8 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Rewhisk dressing before using.)

Combine vinegar, orange juice concentrate, parsley, lemon peel and orange peel in small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. (Dressing can be prepared up to 8 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Rewhisk dressing before using.)
